name: truck town
description:
TRUCK TOWN IS BACK!!!!! use arrow keys to move forward,back,left or right.

this game runs smooth and is much tougher than you think so check it out with great patience let me know what you think about it in the comments .this is my first 3d game i have created on gadot.

for more games,music,wallpapers,novels ,mods ,assets stay tuned coming up soon!!!
